div.p: I wanted to be a lawyer and my mum wanted me to be a doctor but as life changed and we went apart, I departed from my family at a very young age
and sort of at the time I just wanted to settle, I came here when I was 11 years old and at the time I just wanted to settle and
adopt the culture but at the time I wanted to be a lawyer but it’s so difficult because of my language and I couldn’t achieve that
so but then but finance, really, business became an idea in my head and so I followed that, I pursued that until I got somewhere with it
it couldn’t have worked out better
